title: Rivalry Rekindled: Van Aert Set for CX Return in First Duel of Season with Van der Poel
content:
Van Empel shines with 7th win of season as Van Aert's CX return adds some spark to the men's field: 'Racing against Wout is something I've been doing for more than 10 years.'

Read the full article at Rivalry Rekindled: Van Aert Set for CX Return in First Duel of Season with Van der Poel on Velo.
author: ahood
